text: minissu balanawa wade karaya ko kiyala.
namuth owunge oona epakam matha owunta awashya thirana ganne.
eeth kiyanna ba ne monawa weyida kiyalaâ€¦
thawada pawathina kramawedayata wada siyalu kshethra sanwardhanayata upayamargika salasmaka awashyathawaya dadiwa pananagi athi bawa da penwa dena ladi.
ese kirima budu dahamata patahaniyi.
ohu ahanne ethakota amawaka mokadda kiyala?

awasanaye mi harakun usawiyata ragena enu labana athara un wenuwen kisidu nithignyayek peni nositiyi.
ithin me dahaya nisa pirimiyage koshawalata wena haniya mama kalin lipiyaka kiyala athi.(link danna mama danne naha.)
me madhya hamuwa sandaha idikiri me ha injineru sewa amathi dosthara rajitha senarathna mahatha da sahabhagi wuha.
darshana medis liyapu kandulu mitiyawathin kiyana kawipothe thamange kawi kiyawanna kiyala aaradhana karana samaradhana(mathaka widihata nama eeka) kiyala kawi panthiyaka menna mehema kawiyak thibba.

withanagemahathadigukalak wishesha pragathiyak dipthiyak janapriyathwayak penennata nothibunu kiribathgoda disa rohala warthamanaye gunathmaka peraliyak sanituhan kara athi ayuru rohal bimata yana oonama kenakuta dakiya hakiya.mulika â€˜biâ€™ shreniye thibu rohala ada disa rohalak bawata pathwa thibe.akkara kihipayak pura pathiri athi idame akramawathwa idikala godanangili parani eewa wuwath bahira rogi (oo.pi.di.) anshayata athul wana doratuwa sahitha godanangilla dakumkaluya.rohale dakma - gampaha disthrikkaye hondama rohala bawata path kirimaya.
